name: Azurite
description: Some gems have hidden qualities beyond their luster, beyond their shine... Azurite is one of those gems.
orderDetails: For single item orders allow 28 days for delivery. For multiple orders this may take longer

name: Bloodstone
description: Origin of the Bloodstone is unknown, hence its low value. It has a very high shine and 12 sides, however.
orderDetails: For single item orders allow 14 days for delivery. For multiple orders this may take longer

name: Zircon
description: Zircon is our most coveted and sought after gem. You will pay much to be the proud owner of this gorgeous and high shine gem.
orderDetails: For single item orders allow 28 days for delivery. No multiple orders can be taken for this Gem as due to it's rare nature it is 1 per customer
